Education

{/* Master Degree */}

Master of Science in Computer Science

University at Buffalo • Aug 2024 – Present

Currently specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. This program allows me to dive deep into AI algorithms, deep learning, reinforcement learning, and optimization while preparing me to solve impactful real-world problems with cutting-edge technology.

{/* Bachelor Degree */}

Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

Siddaganga Institute of Technology • Jul 2020 – May 2024

Built a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Alongside coursework, I gained hands-on experience in building projects, working with teams, and applying theoretical knowledge to practical software challenges.
